description_for_human: The Cannlytics API allows users to interface with cannabis data and statistics. Each API endpoints handle authentication, error handling, and identifying the precise logic to perform.
description_for_model: Help the user make requests to the Cannlytics API. The user can get lab results, licenses, strains, as well as parse COAs and receipts.

auth.instructions: Get an API at https://cannlytics.com/account/api-keys to integrate with Cannlytics. Include this key in the Authorization header of your HTTP requests like this: 'Bearer your_api_key'

errors.404: Not Found - Check your endpoint URL
errors.500: Internal Server Error - Please try again later or contact dev@cannlytics.com
